description: A video was shared on social media showing boys pushing the woman into the water in Dublin.
title: Dublin canal: Woman pushed into water after 'racial abuse'
title_page: Dublin canal: Woman pushed into water after 'racial abuse' - BBC News
maintext: In a tweet, he said: "Appalling & deeply upsetting. No place for this in Irish society. We must call out racism any time it rears it's (sic) ugly, repulsive head. No child is born a racist - we need to face up to that reality too. We all have a role to play."
